Message of Consolation to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Message of Consolation to Egyptian President 
    Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of consolation to Mohamed Hosni Mubarak, president of Egypt, as regards the great human losses caused by near-simultaneous bombings in the country.
 Kim in the message expressed deep consolation for Mubarak and, through him, the Egyptian government and bereaved families of the victims.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Egyptian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Egyptian Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to his Egyptian counterpart Ahmed Abu al-Gheit in connection with big casualties caused by near-simultaneous bombings in Sharm el-Sheikh, Egypt.
 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the foreign minister and the bereaved families of the victims.

articles.title: Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe Leaves
articles.content:
Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe Leaves
    Pyongyang, July 25 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang schoolchildren's art troupe left here for Macao, China, on Monday to participate in the 4th East Asian Children's Art Festival.
